Module com.example.miniproyecto4
Package com.example.miniproyecto4.view.utils

Class Shapes

java.lang.Object
com.example.miniproyecto4.view.utils.Shapes
public class Shapes extends Object
Utility class for creating visual shapes used in the game interface. Provides factory methods for creating cells, markers, and ship segments with consistent styling. This class cannot be instantiated.

  • Method Details

    • createCellRectangle

      public static javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle createCellRectangle(double size)
      Creates a rectangle representing a board cell. The cell is styled with water color and grid border.
      Parameters:
      size - the width and height of the cell in pixels
      Returns:
      a styled Rectangle representing a cell

    • createHitMarker

      public static javafx.scene.shape.Circle createHitMarker(double radius)
      Creates a circular marker indicating a hit. The marker is filled with the hit marker color.
      Parameters:
      radius - the radius of the circle in pixels
      Returns:
      a Circle representing a hit marker

    • createMissMarker

      public static javafx.scene.shape.Circle createMissMarker(double radius)
      Creates a circular marker indicating a miss. The marker is filled with white and has a grid-colored border.
      Parameters:
      radius - the radius of the circle in pixels
      Returns:
      a Circle representing a miss marker

    • createShipSegment

      public static javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle createShipSegment(double size)
      Creates a rectangle representing a segment of a ship. The segment is styled with ship color and border.
      Parameters:
      size - the width and height of the segment in pixels
      Returns:
      a styled Rectangle representing a ship segment
